actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Government Operations (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-1140.

official_title: Resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Government Operations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-1140) Increases from $250,000 to $296,700 the authorized funds available to the Subcommittee on Federal Spending Practices, Efficiency, and Open Government of the Senate Committee on Government Operations for inquiries and investigations from March 1, 1976, through February 28, 1977.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Government Operations.
